Title: [Calendar] Adding an event from email is not possible

Truta Adrian from Testlio:

*Environment:*
Acompli Version 1.0.8 (82)
Samsung SIII Mini Android 4.1.1
Wi-fi connection
Account: adriantest1ng@adriantest1ng.onmicrosoft.com

*Steps to reproduce:*
1. Launch app with exchange account configured
2. Compose new email and Create an invitation
3. Create event and send email

Event is created, and invitation event is received by Invitees

*Actual result:*
Event is created, and invitation event is not received by Invitees

Title: Add telemetries that cover all types of ROs
Structural content validation
Description:
Assure that there are no duplicate culture/guid combinations in the repo. We do not want to scan the entire repo to do this. If we can assume that a  branch is kept in a good state ( and so it was in a good state before whatever change prompted this validation build), then we can just look at what has changed. 

Two potential solutions:
Query ACMS
Once we have the changes we could maybe query ACMS to determine if there are duplicates, however there could be an edit where the path has changed, and we wouldn't want to declare a duplicate against itself.

Using StorageIndex in the CMSCore lib:
StorageIndex is an index of guid/paths in a repo at a particular commit ID. It can be updated efficiently just by looking at changes that have occurred since the commit ID the index is currently for and current commit ID. With this route we would need to persist the storage index somewhere like blob storage.

Location in the pipeline:
This validation step should be in the build process. We will report all errors that we find and then fail the build.
Comments: Remove this for now until we figure out  what we need.

Title: OfficeOnline Ship Blocker XL: PortChangelist - port changelist 19547318 to tenantxlrel01
[Project]: Delete confirmation dialog should have focus on delete button
Description:
REPRO STEPS:
  1. Try to delete a summary task
  2. Delet confirmation dialog pops up. It has Delete in green selected
  3. press Enter

EXPECTED:

Delete confirmed and dialog is dismissed with tasks deleted

What should happen.


ACTUAL:


The dialog stays. User need to tab to Delete button. Hit enter only then it goes away

What actually happens.


USER BAD:

Title: Possible OCS EUII Leak Found: Tag b1q4i requires cleanup for GDPR compliance.
Description:
###Title: Possible OCS EUII Leak Found: Tag b1q4i requires cleanup for GDPR compliance.
###Assigned to: orensh@microsoft.com
###Tags: EUIICCLeak;tag_b1q4i_;OCS
###Assert Tag: b1q4i

Tag b1q4i might contain a PII leak. Please triage and if needed fix it immediately.
 
Personal Identifiable Information is any information relating to an identifiable person, this might include URL's, document names or any data entered by the user.

Leak Details
Leak type | SpecificKeyword
Product | Hosted Office Online
Tag Name | b1q4i
Leak Content | appdata
Filename | //depot/devmainoverride/tenantxl/xl/xlserver/XlOcsServer.cpp
Last Edited By | REDMOND\niryan on 2019/09/17 19:19:58 with CL19607954
Hourly Count | 160
Sample Session ID | 895bafc5-327f-4b69-982b-1fd1656bdbc8
Leak Samples | Sample Data

The following tips might be useful to triage:

  1. Remove the entire log if it is the only way to prevent leak and the log is not of much use. Please make sure that you consult with the respective team before doing so.
  2. Remove a faulty parameter. Note that URLs are anyhow hashed (redacted) by default so by removing a URL that failed to be redacted you don't lose telemetry capabilities.
  3. Wrap the parameter with a PII scrubbing function. The following class has some useful scrubbing methods : osiplatform\src\runtime\dll\Pii.cs
  4. Leaks caused by fonts are the greatest source of false positives. Usafe of Pii.FontScrub() method for ay identified bug could help in reducing the false positives eventually.
  5. Custom fix the bug if needed.
  6. Every bug should be resolved with a proper reason. Here is what each reason stands for:
    1. Not Repro : If you don't see a leak anymore, resolve as Not Repro.
    2. Won't Fix : If you think it is a false positive, resolve as Won't Fix.
    3. By Design : If you think the log was a added for a reason or for troubleshooting, resolve as By Design.
    4. Duplicate : In case you see the same bug again, mark it as duplicate.
    5. Fixed : Mark the bug as fixed once it is fixed with code change.
  7. Every bug resolved as Won't Fix/By Design should be whitelisted.
  8. Currently whitelisting access is restricted. Please use this form ( PII Leak Detector Enhancer ) to whitelist the tag.. Same holds for adding exclusion patterns.
  9. Any bug the is fixed won't be scanned for PII leaks for next 45 days.

 

To whitelist a tag, add new pattern exclusion or add new PII leak keyword: PII Leak Detector Enhancer

Please feel free to give your feedback

Title: Country & Language Pivot - Coordination
Feature: WXP Button String Fix
Description: Strings on action card should say "get word" and the text for powerpoint should say powerPoint not power point.
ReproSteps:
If you are not able to open this, that is tracked by a different bug, please add shaker/log details to this bug issue. If this is the case and it opens in safari, please try deleting the app and re-downloading it. You may also try opening a different file type (i.e. if you are using a word shared file, try an excel)


Open an email that is a one drive link shared with you of an app you do not have installed (i.e. if you have word installed, do not use word). When opening in the previewer, a half card should appear asking you to install word (if you do not see the card, make sure the "WXP Upsell Card" flight is on in settings, and go to the debug menu in settings (if you do not have that you might not be able to test this) -> Account Actions -> Reset WXP Upsell Counts). 


When the half card appears, the text in the button should read "Get Word", "Get Excel", "Get PowerPoint", "Get Visio" with the respective file types.
Comments:
Unable to check, it always prompts to select the default browser in order to open the OneDrive shared file, regardless of the type (excel, ppt or word) - please see video


Also followed "Debug Actions > Account Actions -> Reset WXP Upsell Counts" and it still prompts the browsers.


Tried in 3.34 using iPhone XS Max / iOS 12.3.1 for Hx account


Attachments:


  • [Na_208610.mp4]

Title: <iOS><ImagetoTable><Imagetotext>In no network  case , error to show up on actions screen
Description:
Expected: User should see error upfront. 
Current behavior: User captures and crops and then sees the error
Comments: @Akshai Varma - is this DF blocker? if Android Df has same issue, then it shouldn't be a df blocker.

@Akshai Varma based on conversation with you and @Abhishek Agarwal (LENS) , assigning this bug to you. Please cross check with @Bharath Manoj Manda  and close according if considering as not bug.

Abhishek point is on click of actions there may not be internet but on after taking picture if internet present then we are unnecessary blocking user. If he really don't has internet then before processing OCR text, we will show no internet dialog then user will fix his internet issue and retry with same image.

Title: [HelpShift Issue] Feedback tracker for new 'Dark mode' for "Black" Theme
Description:
Feedbacks:

https://office365.helpshift.com/admin/issue/253601/ (08/21/2019)
[ 16.0.12019.20000 | Dogfood ] - font color
"Mail content is not visible in dark mode."

https://office365.helpshift.com/admin/issue/223897/ (07/09/2019)
[ 16.0.11814.20000 | Dogfood ] (wrong font color for the background)
" I have outlook dark mode enabled, twice recently when I've sent mail outlook has used the dark mode font color and sent it with a white background (flipping the dark mode reading pane results in the dark mode background and the light font color). The result is unreadable messages (see screenshot)."

https://office365.helpshift.com/admin/issue/225278/ (07/11/2019)
[ 16.0.11901.20080 | Microsoft ] (negative)
The latest update of the dark theme actually defeats the purpose of the contrast level.
Specially on a setup where the reading pane takes more than 1/2 of the screen.

https://office365.helpshift.com/admin/issue/223223/ (07/08/2019)
"Thanks for adding dark mode to email reading pane, email content looks much more visually appealing and easier on the eyes!" [ 16.0.11901.20018 | Microsoft ] (wrong font color for the background)

https://office365.helpshift.com/admin/issue/220180/ (07/03/2019)
"Dark grey theme should change the background of emails to a dark color and the text to white."
[ 16.0.11827.20002 | Microsoft ] (wrong font color for the background)

https://office365.helpshift.com/admin/issue/214650/ (06/25/2019)
"Extend the 'dark mode' theming to the Scheduling Assistant view of a meeting/appointment All Attendees and Calendar pane."

https://office365.helpshift.com/admin/issue/194951/ ( 05/28/2019 )
[ 16.0.11722.20000 | Dogfood ] positive - "not reporting a problem, just kudos for the new dark reading mode!!!!! love it! :)"

https://office365.helpshift.com/admin/issue/184905/ (05/10/2019)
[ 16.0.11701.20000 | Dogfood ] (wrong font color for the background)
"This is a box with black text inside, the black text turns white in dark mode, but the white box stays white, making the text unreadable."

https://office365.helpshift.com/admin/issue/183438/ (05/08/2019)
[ 16.0.11629.20008 ] (hightlighting and wrong font color for the background) 
 "Dark mode background for email messages makes highlighting almost invisible. When I first started using dark mode, email messages still had white backgrounds. I appreciate the attempt to change that, but it has an unwanted side effect. I am viewing a complicated email (about flighting changes) and the author has tried to make it easy to read by highlighting the parts that have changed (such as the text "50% Dogfood Devmain"). But the highlighting is almost unnoticeable with the dark background. Please fix."
 
https://office365.helpshift.com/admin/issue/180038/ (05/02/2019)
[16.0.11608.20004] highlight color - "The highlight colors used in dark mode aren't varied enough. I'm not colorblind or anything, but it's hard to distinguish between the three shades of green that appear in Natalie's message, and she's trying to use highlighting to make a point."

https://office365.helpshift.com/admin/issue/179456/  (05/01/2019)
[ 16.0.11625.20000 ] field order - "There's an ugly white band around the email separators in dark mode. (Happy to forward the email to someone on OLK but I figured I should be good puppychowhound and use the normal feedback tool)"

https://office365.helpshift.com/admin/issue/178774/  (04/30/2019)
font color - "Sometimes when I am replying to an email in Outlook in "Dark mode" my text is rendered in black which makes it hard to read against the dark gray background. The text color stays black when scrolling up/down, but fixes itself sometimes when I minimize/maximize the window, or for example when this Feedback pane opened up. It happens may every couple of days."

https://office365.helpshift.com/admin/issue/178610/ (04/30/2019)
auto-detect based on message content when to disable 'Night Mode' - "Some emails (using template) appears black on black with Dark theme enabled for reading pane. Attached screenshot of the emails with comparison with white background."

https://office365.helpshift.com/admin/issue/175085/ (04/24/2019)
positive - "Awesome dark theme and dark email representation in the reading pane. THanks a lot guys, great job!!!"

https://office365.helpshift.com/admin/issue/175686/  (04/24/2019)
general - "Having selected a dark mode for the application doesn't really affect how the primary reading area is shown. The reason why I choose dark mode is so it is easy for me to read text - especially it would help for long text. It would be great if the default message body reflects this choice of my preference. Thank you."

https://office365.helpshift.com/admin/issue/174049/  (04/22/2019)
font color - "My text just turned black on the black background."

https://office365.helpshift.com/admin/issue/174039/ (04/22/2019)
formatting - "Formatting in my table in dark mode looks very different.. is there any mans to preseve it or preserve the cource background of the HTML table when pasting to dark mode?"

https://office365.helpshift.com/admin/issue/172205/  (04/18/2019)
positive \ white lines - "I love the dark mode for reading pane! There are still a few hiccups (sometimes the horizontal lines between messages in a thread have a white background while otherwise they're dark. But they're minor and I'm sure you'll get it ironed out. Kudos - happy to see this!"

https://office365.helpshift.com/admin/issue/170636/ 
global setting - "I like the new change to allow viewing mail in a dark theme, however, I don't like the fact that I have to switch the backgroung on each email rather than allowing a global setting. Is should be able to opt-out of dark them globally."

((I have reached out to the user for the setting in File\Options - themes. I will update this feedback if they confirm\respond.))

https://office365.helpshift.com/admin/issue/168981/ 
positive - "DARK MODE FOR THE WINS!"

https://office365.helpshift.com/admin/issue/169181/ 
auto-detect background - "Can't tell you how much I love the new dark mode!! However here is a case that still needs work - the table in the document has apparently a transparent background. If we can determine that shape has transparency perhaps we need some special code for that."

https://office365.helpshift.com/admin/issue/168720/ 
Font color -
"Issues:
1. With the NightMode feature enabled, some text in emails is being rendered as black on a black background, making it unreadable.
2. Clicking the "Switch Background" button seems to have no effect.
Repro steps (black text on black background): 
1. Unknown - In the example included, only some of the text which I typed is black. Other text, before and after, is white and readable. (The text is slightly easier to see on the Paint example. I will attach that PNG file as well).
Notes: 
- Parts of the text in the example message are copy-pasted from earlier in the thread, but all of the black text is something I typed directly (not copy-pasted from anywhere).
- I am running in Black theme. Switching to White theme and back to Black theme does not resolve the black text issue."

https://office365.helpshift.com/admin/issue/169305/ 
general - "Poor contrast ratio in dark mode on buttons (Go to conversation) in Teams Daily Digest (auto-generated) emails.
Screen shot is tryign to take all three of my screens with no ability to crop, so my answer is no. I can send a cropped screen shot if you contact me." 

https://office365.helpshift.com/admin/issue/170421/ 
general - "The new feature to Switch Backgrounds for the email content pane should be preserve, it is not even preserve for the selected message once you select another and navigate back it goes back to the default color. Having the user to click this button every sing time is annoying."

https://office365.helpshift.com/admin/issue/170517/ 
positive - "I love the changes coming! The layout of the send message and send appointsment windows are a lot more modern looking! reminds me of bootstrap :)"

https://office365.helpshift.com/admin/issue/170523/ 
general - "I love the new dark mode where the message pane is also dark. However, the line-break between messages seems to be broken. Shoudn't it be dark, too?"

https://office365.helpshift.com/admin/issue/168895/ 
positive - "dark mode for message reading, wonderful! Thank you so much!!!"

https://office365.helpshift.com/admin/issue/167864/ 
positive feedback - "Seriousally love the total black backround of the content. Amazing. thanks so much"

https://office365.helpshift.com/admin/issue/168178/ (from erikaj@microsoft.com) 
preview pane - "I have a mail message that is unreadable in dark mode. The background is not dark but apparently the text does recognize it should be dark mode. If I toggle back to 'day mode' I can ready the light gray text"

Title: SECURITY: Account doc updates
Description:
See email attachment for a new topic (or perhaps update an existing topic) with specific account info. Will require editing and some rewrites. 

PM: Nate McCord
Comments: Followed up the email with another request for help re: placement
Emailed Dani & Peter

@Marty, follow up with Dani Halfin about where you might want to put this privacy topic for admins. The privacy content is here: https://github.com/MicrosoftDocs/windows-itpro-docs/tree/master/windows/privacy

Draft

The same Microsoft account may have different access rights on different devices. This is because Microsoft accounts can be used on multiple devices -- not all of which have the same security needs.
​​​
For example, while it would be perfectly appropriate to assign a Microsoft account full access rights on your personal mobile phone, it would be not be appropriate to grant full access rights to the same account when you are using it to sign in to a service at an electronic kiosk.​​​
​​
Having full access rights across the board would be a serious security risk, while denying rights across the board could impede important tasks. For this reason, Microsoft accounts are automatically assigned certain access rights based upon how the account is added to the device. ​​
​​
Accounts are assigned full rights, and set as the primary account on the device, only if they are added to the device in the following ways:​​
​​
* Signing in to the account while setting up the device for the first time​
* Opening **Settings**, navigating to **Accounts** > **Other users**, and selecting **Add someone else to this PC**​
* Opening **Settings**, navigating to **Accounts** > **Your info** and selecting **Sign in with Microsoft account instead**​
​​
> [!NOTE]​
> A primary account will not have the option to select which apps can sign them in.​

Important links:
  • https://osgwiki.com/wiki/MSA_Experience
  • https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/security/identity-protection/access-control/microsoft-accounts
  • https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/security/identity-protection/access-control/local-accounts

Parsing the emails...

Looks like the doc to edit is https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/security/identity-protection/access-control/access-control#permissions? https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/security/identity-protection/access-control/microsoft-accounts

From email thread below:
My explanation was specifically for a user who didn’t understand why they could toggle adjust app permissions for an account on one device, and not toggle it for the same account on a different device.

Yeah, while end-users/home users may experience an issue that is a symptom of their account state, it requires a somewhat technical / detailed explanation more suitable for the other userbase. So I do believe it aligns more with docs.

My other concern is CELA claims the Learn more links for linking to required privacy statements, and Peter Tysver is already dealing with converting some explanations on Sign-in options to a tutorial + privacy hybrid for that reason.

Here’s the wiki page breaking it down:

https://osgwiki.com/wiki/MSA_Experience

My explanation was specifically for a user who didn’t understand why they could toggle adjust app permissions for an account on one device, and not toggle it for the same account on a different device.

Here’s that:

“Thanks for your feedback, it’s definitely troublesome anytime a product is giving you inconsistent experiences.

The difference comes from how the account was added on each device.

Depending on how the account was added, it can be a different type of account.

First, if an account was added with any of these methods it becomes the primary account:

  • Signing in to the account while setting up the device for the first time
  • Opening the Settings app, navigating to Accounts > Other users and selecting Add someone else to this PC
  • Opening the Settings app, navigating to Accounts > Your info and selecting Sign in with Microsoft account instead
    • Note: This is only available if this person does not already have a primary account

A primary account will not have the option to select which apps can sign them in.

If the account was not added this way, it was added by:

  1. Opening a Microsoft app (Examples: Store, Maps, etc.) and signing in with your Microsoft account or Opening the Settings app, navigating to Accounts > Email & accounts and selecting Add a Microsoft account
  2. After entering in the account credentials, a dialogue will ask whether you wish to Use this account everywhere on your device. You’ll be able to select the Next button or Microsoft apps only.
    1. By selecting Next, the account will automatically sign in to all Microsoft apps
    2. By selecting Microsoft apps only, you’ll be able to change the option later from the Email & accounts page.

To switch from a primary account you’ll have to first disconnect your Microsoft account in 1 of 2 ways:

        1. Open the Settings app, navigate to Accounts > Your info
        2. Click “Sign in with a local account instead”

or

  1. Open the Settings app, navigate to Accounts > Email & accounts
  2. Select the account you would like to remove
  3. Click the “Remove” button

Next, attach the account using the other method listed above.

Just so you know, if you do not see this option, that account is able to use extra features such as syncing your settings, finding a lost device, and more.”

I definitely wouldn’t want the switch suggestion as we don’t believe that that will move them towards a better state. However, some explanation of confusing account states would be useful for the users that wish to know.

Best,

Nate

Title: [iOS & Android] Location suggestion is not working correctly while creating events for google accounts
Description:

Outlook Version: 3.0.107


Ticket: https://www.osupportweb.com/admin/issue/10974564/


Video : https://1drv.ms/v/s!AODLAygTZwKpgYdV


I was able to reproduce this issue.

With Google account, while adding a location there is no suggestion even if write the complete city/street name.

With Outlook.com accounts it works but when we save the event and re-open it, when we tap on the location it doesn't lead to the Maps app on the device.

Thank you

The issue can be reproduced by following the same steps the user have done on the Video.​


We got a also a repro with iOS.


Thank you
​



Able to reproduce internally? Yes
ReproSteps:
• Open Outlook Mobile
  • Select calendar Tab
  • Create a new event on Google account and try to add a location
  • No suggestion will appear while adding a location​
ExpectedOutcome: The app should suggest locations while adding a location
ActualOutcome: The app doesn’t suggest any location event we write the complete address/City name
Comments: Verified https://www.bingapis.com/api/v6/Places/AutoSuggest works for Android with GoogleCloudCache account

The log referenced below shows the call to Bing's API  at https://www.bingapis.com/api/v6/Places/AutoSuggest timing out.

@Qasim Iqbal Yes, if LAS is not enabled for Google Cloud Cache we fall back to the old Bing API at least on Android. I cannot repro this issue with a Google Cloud Cache account on iOS (using both Bing API and LAS with the lasGoogleCloudCache feature flag enabled).

Both O365 and Outlook accounts are using LAS.

@Michael Andriichuk Can you check on Android whether locations suggestions are working for Google Cloud Cache accounts.

Hmm, For Google accounts I thought we were falling back to the old Bing API that works with any account type, and the substrate LAS API is used for Office365/Outlook.com account types. I wonder if something changed about the endpoint that's preventing us from using that now? @Charles Cook do you know what the expectation should be here for Google / Outlook.com accounts?
@Ariana Mesa  thank you Aria! will close this one as per design.
@Bright Cao this is actually by design. We use the Bing API tool and Gmail accounts don't work with the Bing API tool. CC @Qasim Iqbal who can provide more info 😊

(vasashid) OfficeVSO:3704851 - [HockeyApp][Native crash] ARC::InvalidCast() [Utility.h, line 327]

Explain Defect: [Word][Skia] Bug : 3704851 Fix Invalid Factory Cast Hockey Crash

Description

---------------

We found a hockey app crash because of an incorrect factory cast when

filling a region. As per the crash stack we call

Arc::Skia::RenderTarget2D::FillGeometry(ARC::IGeometry const&,

ARC::IBrush const&). Recently, I made a change to ensure the geometry

and brush are always created from the same factory as that of the

render target. However, we create a new brush from the same factory

ONLY IF the held brush reference is null. Its possible that

the held brush was created from a different factory than the render

target we are drawing to at the moment.

Explain Fix: Fix

----

Check that the held brush's factory is the same as that of the render target we are drawing to. Create a new brush incase of a factory mismatch

Notes: Validations

--------------

I haven't been able to repro the crash, so couldn't verify that this

indeed fixes it. Performed sanity testing of different rendering

scenarios for a variety of documents.

1. E2Os (and those with 3D effects), Tables with different borders ,

proofing squiggles,text, ink, Word Art, OLE objects render as expected

2. Nav scrubber and Touch Drag previews render as expected

Reviewer: psharm;apurvas;deepka

BB Job IDs: 377251414

Codeflow ID: 766749

Trigger overrides: osubmitdepot;

[Word][Skia] Bug : 3704851 Fix Invalid Factory Cast Hockey Crash

Description

---------------

We found a hockey app crash because of an incorrect factory cast when

filling a region. As per the crash stack we call

Arc::Skia::RenderTarget2D::FillGeometry(ARC::IGeometry const&,

ARC::IBrush const&). Recently, I made a change to ensure the geometry

and brush are always created from the same factory as that of the

render target. However, we create a new brush from the same factory

ONLY IF the held brush reference is null. The concept of reusing the

held brush isn't valid with Skia because there is no guarantee that the

'held' realization in RTRLZBR is still applicable. Its possible that

the held brush was created from a different factory than the render

target we are drawing to at the moment. Since RTRLZBR isn't bound to a

render target or factory, the concept of holding/caching a resource and

reusing it doesn't make sense. I've checked that there are no other

instances where we do so.

Fix

----

Always create a new brush and not bother with using cached resources.

I've also removed the call tol cache the brush further down.

Validations

--------------

I haven't been able to repro the crash, so couldn't verify that this

indeed fixes it. Performed sanity testing of different rendering

scenarios for a variety of documents.

1. E2Os (and those with 3D effects), Tables with different borders ,

proofing squiggles,text, ink, Word Art, OLE objects render as expected

2. Nav scrubber and Touch Drag previews render as expected

Title: Update miniconda
Description:
Not necessary, but maybe a good-to-have. Allows us to be on a modern version of pip, conda, etc.

Our current version (4.1.11) is a year and a half old. 2016-07-28



Original Ticket Number: AC-40137

Original Ticket Type: Task

Sprints:
Sprint 194
Sprint 195

Reporter: Dylan Wang

Original Components:
Frontend
Comments:
Jira Comment History:

Dylan Wang on 2019-01-04 18:07:14 (+0000):

Try to get a good understanding of how miniconda works, since you'll soon need it to create a new python3 environment.

The reason for using miniconda instead of virtualenv or pyenv or such, is that we need to control some packages beyond just python version, such as the OpenSSL version (if there's another tool out there that supports this, let me know). Once we move fully to docker/kubernetes, this won't be such an issue anymore.

Note that I did write a CONDA_README.md in our source, it might be a bit out of date but for the most part I think it's fine.



Noah Yu on 2019-01-08 05:51:41 (+0000):

I'm not sure if I get the point.

To update a conda package, for example, conda-4.5.12, what need to do is to update the urls.txt (to`https://nexus.acompli.net:8443/repository/continuum-linux-64-proxy/conda-4.5.12-py27_0.tar.bz2`),
then run `wget` to download the packages, and run `conda index` to update the channel.

Got stuck at the `wget` step, the nexus proxy returned 404 Not Found. The assets in nexus should be automatically fetched, right?



Dylan Wang on 2019-01-08 19:43:44 (+0000):

Looks like it's because we were pointing at the pkgs/free channel and not the pkgs/main channel. The free channel didn't have 4.5.12.

I just asked Pavel to update Nexus and add
https://repo.continuum.io/pkgs/main/linux-64/
https://repo.continuum.io/pkgs/main/osx-64/

Now, if you reference `continuum-linux-64-proxy`, it will search both the free and main channels. (same for osx-64).



Dylan Wang on 2019-01-08 19:51:00 (+0000):

Also some of the urls are using `continuum-pkgs/main` right now. We should fix them now that the proxy will search through the main channel.

The only reason we have a `continuum-pkgs` mirror is for testing.



Dylan Wang on 2019-01-08 21:06:12 (+0000):

Actually, let's update all the packages to use
https://nexus.acompli.net/repository/continuum-linux-64/ or https://nexus.acompli.net/repository/continuum-osx-64/



Dylan Wang on 2019-01-11 19:25:34 (+0000):

Also, I noticed our OpenSSL package is a bit out of date. See if you can bump the version at the same time as you upgrade miniconda. If you can't, no worries. We can do it in a separate ticket.

Title: Remove Special Characters from titles of templates
Description:
###Assigned To: HongDa@microsoft.com

###Priority: 2

###Original Estimate: 2

###Remaining Work: 2

###Completed Work: 0

###Area Path: GSX\GSXCON\Support and Learning

###Iteration Path: GSX\CY19Q3 (Jul-Sep)\1909-Sep

 

发件人: Seoyoung Kim <SeoYoung.Kim@microsoft.com>
发送时间: 2019年9月20日 14:25
收件人: Katharine Grant <katho@microsoft.com>; Declan Duffy <dduffy@MICROSOFT.com>; Jeremy Liu <Jeremy.Liu@microsoft.com>
抄送: HongLing Da <hongda@microsoft.com>
主题: RE: Remove Special Characters from titles of templates

 

Thanks for sharing this, Katharine

 

I think Declan can fill us in about how template titles are determined and whether there’re any requirements for Win32 experience (in-app search), such as whether # per page or works with xxx are required in the title, considering that some templates have many variations with slightly different layout or design – some examples below:

 

  • Return address labels (Bamboo, 30 per page, works with Avery 5160)
  • Return address labels (basic format, 80 per page)
  • Return address labels (basic format, 80 per page, works with Avery 5167)
  • Return address labels (Black and White wedding design, 30 per page, works with Avery 5160)
  • Return address labels (Rainbow Bears design, 30 per page, works with Avery 5160)

 

  • Shipping labels (Blue Background design, 10 per page)
  • Shipping labels (Blue Background design, 6 per page)
  • Shipping labels (Blue Border design, 10 per page)
  • Shipping labels (Blue Border design, 6 per page)
  • Shipping labels (Blue Gradient design, 10 per page)
  • Shipping labels (Green Gradient design, 10 per page, works with Avery 5163)
  • Shipping labels (Green Gradient design, 6 per page, works with Avery 5164)
  • Shipping labels (Green Wave design, 6 per page)
  • Shipping labels (Red design, 6 per page, works with Avery 8254)
  • Shipping labels (Sienna design, 10 per page, works with Avery 5163)
  • Shipping labels (Simple Lines design, 10 per page)                   

 

From content/SEO point of view, not all texts need to be in title and would be enough to mention in descriptions. May need to be rewritten to avoid using () and comma.     

 

From: Katharine Grant <katho@microsoft.com>
Sent: Friday, September 20, 2019 1:36 PM
To: Seoyoung Kim <SeoYoung.Kim@microsoft.com>; Declan Duffy <dduffy@MICROSOFT.com>; Jeremy Liu <Jeremy.Liu@microsoft.com>
Cc: HongLing Da <hongda@microsoft.com>
Subject: RE: Remove Special Characters from titles of templates

 

The impact is that these URLs are showing up as duplicates for google and getting excluded.  I think they are a significant chunk of the remaining 236 URLs getting ignored in the EN market.  Let’s wait on updating the titles until Syed gets back next week and discuss it at the SEO meeting.  I think we should start with the engineering part of fixing this.  One thing to consider on the content side is that we inconsistently use () vs. , to delineate things like # per page, etc.  Do we have a content preference here?

 

 

For reference, I went through about half of the list and this is the first 133.

Title: For some users : Privacy FRE is being shown on every launch
Description:
Found during Bug bash. One user kept seeing the Privacy FRE for all launches. The account used was an MSA account.

Logs attached.
Comments:
Hi Madhuri,

Thanks for reporting these but these doesn’t seem to be happening on WXP.  The issue could be at any place including OneNote integration code, Docs shared code, auth/identity code or the privacy APIs. Please debug further and identify the root cause of the issue so that the bug could be looked into by the right area owner.

Possible suggestions for your investigation:

For #3719116: Is OneNote setting the active identity correctly after adding new account, Is identity giving a callback for Mso::Authentication::GetOnProfileAddEventSource()

For #3729118: Is OneNote calling FRE seen API before roaming setting download, is it a possible race condition for OneNote.

The issues reported here are at the top level and are not immediately actionable on us, kindly investigate further and reassign to the right owner post discussion with them. Reassigning the bugs back to you as of now.

Title: Telemetry - find dead code
Description:
Suggestion SendTraceOnceTag
For example (GridViewBase.cs -> OnViewportChange):
  else if (this.ViewBlockFlowPushHeight == 0)
  {
   // set push to the existing push plus 1, or existing space prefetch buffer; don't allow negative or no space
   ULS.DebugSendTraceTag(0x62643966 /* tag_bd9f */, ULSCat.msoulscat_ES_EWAJSGrid, ULSTraceLevel.Info, "GridViewBase.OnViewportChange: inadequate space for flows, adding some empty space by pushing down");
   viewportScrollAdjustmentY = Math.Floor(Math.Max(viewBufferTop, estimatedBlockHeight * PrefetchDefaultBlockHeight));
   this.ViewBlockFlowPushHeight = viewportScrollAdjustmentY;
  }

Description:

The Secure attribute is meant to keep cookie communication limited to encrypted transmission, directing browsers to use cookies only via secure/encrypted connections.

Recommendation:

whenever a cookie contains sensitive information or is a session token, then it should always be passed using an encrypted tunnel. for example, after logging into an application and a session token is set using a cookie, then verify it is tagged using the ";secure" flag. if it is not, then the browser believes it safe to pass via an unencrypted channel such as using http.

Title: Add pre-defined search filter like "From:" "Subject:" on search bar in Outlook for IOS. (118070218496709)
Description:
Customer would like to confirm if it's possible to add pre-defined search filter in outlook for IOS like "From:" "Subject:" As currently they need to type the filter manually when searching every time.

Please refer to the custom search bar in Desktop Outlook. Attached the screenshot.



Original Ticket Number: ENT-871

Original Ticket Type: Design Change Request

Reporter: Shone Shen - CSS SE
Comments:
Jira Comment History:

Charles Deng on 2018-07-10 08:47:48 (+0000):

Customer wants to have add the pre-defined search criteria option like "From", "Subject" in search bar to do customized search easily.



Michael Palermiti on 2018-07-30 17:26:14 (+0000):

Assigned to Reena Wei, who is collecting and prioritizing all of our upcoming Search work.



Reena Wei on 2018-07-31 16:43:29 (+0000):

On backlog already. Also once we are on 3S, it will support simple KQL such as FROM.



Shone Shen - CSS SE on 2018-09-27 03:32:57 (+0000):

Hi @Reena, may I know if there's any further progress on this DCR? Thank you.



Reena Wei on 2018-09-27 20:21:27 (+0000):

The user can type "from:", "to:", "subject:" in the search box, then followed by the query to refine results. There is no UI to select this filter, it must be typed in the search box. Note that this simple KQL is only support on the new search service in online mode. We are currently rolling out at 100% on iOS and 50% on Android.

Title: 3: Support Prague as an OCS format
LaunchInAppContactSupport should have a way to pass some generic context, or IDataCollector should be augmented
Comments:
Talked to Shakeel, no one needed this item right now. Postponed.
Items priorities: 2, 1, 3
@Duncan Zhuang :  can you please work with @Shakeel Solkar  to see if this work could/should get done?  Thanks.

discussion on bug:
  1. idatacollector should be split into two types based on payload type
  2. expose notification/callback to the callers of CInAppContactSupportDialog::LaunchInAppContactSupport
  3. built in configurable 3rd party cloud notificationhandler (this might be specific now but could be leverage later; good to have common code). for example: OnCreateTicket there is a built in handler which informs an specific end point which could be any service (in search's case it would be 3s which is informed when a ticket is created). And the event data should contain some kind of sessionID like DiagnosticsSessionID in search's case. 
Priority from Search team's perspective : 2 is highest

from the details it looks like Marius wants 
  1. Notification/eventing for the callers of LaunchInAppContactSupport. 
    1. NOTE: we already have these behind the LaunchInAppContactSupport functionality, and maybe Marius is asking exactly that we should expose those to the callers. 
  2. IDataCollector is now hitting its maturity and needs additional behavior and type specificity. for example he calls out that a data collector's type hierarchy. i want to know how this would help but I think this belongs in the classes not in the interface which i think should be generic.

feedback from Marius over discussion on email: 

                Ideally IDataCollector (which is more IDataProvider, at least in the current form) should have just a GetType that returns something a long of GetPayloadType today. Then you can qi_cast to something derived out of IDataCollector and have appropriate methods GetFileName or GetJSonString or what have you.

                Now in my case I have some additional stuff to do once the ticket is created, in the current form I have an OnSearchTickedCreated, but maybe the shape ends up in the base IDataCollector and everybody gets notified and not do anything, or maybe on the base you have another method GetInterestingEvents where you can return I want to be called post-creation or something like this, and in that case you also have to implement IDiagnosticsActions that has On* methods.

                There are a few ways to shape this, and I think we now have enough collectors to put them in a rational hierarchy. If you want to discuss this in person, or if you have code review meetings that you want to take over for how to improve the design, I would be more than glad to join and help. It doesn’t have to be right before somebody attacks this issue and that would allow us to have a wider discussion with less time pressure. As I said, happy to help in any way I can.

Regards,

                Marius

Right now if you need to do additional things on ticket submission is not possible without adding reponsabilities IDataCollector (which is more like IDataProvider, and probably be split in more interfaces one for JSON and one for file based), or re-plumb the entire thing. 

Please assign as appropriate and take into consideration as the API evolves.

Title: #4 - Windows10_WXP: [Search UI] After tabbing, Search default text is getting selected
Description:
Windows version: Windows10

App version: 16.0.11720.20000 (Installed through Office Deployment tool)
Build Type: Dogfood
Does this issue repro in Windows 7: Yes
Does this issue repro in other App: Yes (Word, Excel, PPT)

Does this issue repro consistently: Yes
Repro Steps:

  1. Launch WXP 
  2. Click inside the search UI (Search default text is not getting selected)
  3. Perform Tabbing to reach Recommended pivot
  4. Now Click inside the search UI 
  5. Observe Search default text is getting selected

Note: Bug repro only when user reaches to Recommended through Tabbing


Actual Result:  After tabbing, Search default text is getting selected

Expected Result:  Search default text should not be selected

search_default_text_select

@Ranesh Saha any ideas what might be causing this behavior?

Title: Accessibility: Stellar: Calendar: Date picker gets invoked again after selecting a date in new event/ edit event dialogs.
Description:
Environment Details:
Windows OS version: 1903(Build 18980.1)
Calendar app version: 16005.12124.31018.0
Account used: v-id
AT: Keyboard

Prerequisite:
  1. Launch Calendar application and login with valid credentials.
Repro Steps:
  1. Navigate to the 'new event' button and invoke it.
  2. Now navigate to the 'start date' button and invoke it so that the datepicker appears.
  3. Navigate to any date in the datepicker and invoke it using enter and observe the behaviour.
Actual Results:
After selecting any date from the date picker using enter key the date picker again gets invoked automatically. 

Note:
User can dismiss the datepicker using esc/tab key.

Accessibility Insights for Windows:
Event is triggered for 'window popup' automatically on selecting any date from the datepicker.

Expected Results:
After selecting any date from the date picker using enter key the date picker again should not get invoked automatically. The focus should land on the 'Start Date/ End Date' button.
The date picker should only be invoked when the keyboard focus is on the 'Start Date/ End Date' button and the user hits enter.

User Impact:
Users with motor impairment who rely on keyboard might face difficulty if the date picker gets invoked automatically after selecting the date and users need to use esc/ tab key to dismiss it.

MAS Link: MAS 3.2.1 - On Focus
Tags: A11yFeature; A11yLowImpact; A11yMAS; Accessibility; MAS3.2.1; Sev4; Stellar; WiPro
Comments: Completing Pull Request 358083 and the associated work items.
@William Roeder  do you think this is the same issue as the "agenda view plus new event" on enter problem you are looking at?

Title: Accessibility: Project Board: MAS2.4.3: Focus is not falling on the first interactive element i.e More Options after activating the bucket
Description:
Build details:

OS Version: 1903 (Build 18956.1000)

Edge Version: 44.18956.1000.0

                                                                                            

Pre-requisite:

 Launch Edge browser. Go to https://project.microsoft.com/ and sign in with below credentials.

User ID:User198@projfeedback.onmicrosoft.com

password: Coc69481


Repro Steps:

1.Navigate to ‘Create New’ dropdown box and activate it.

2.Navigate to “Project (Preview)” button and activate it.

3.Add some tasks in the grid page and Navigate to Board and activate it.

4.Navigate to ‘Group by progress’ dropdown box and select Bucket in menu item activate it.

5.Now press tab the focus will fall on ‘To do’ Bucket list, activate it and observe the keyboard focus.


Actual Result

After pressing Enter key the keyboard focus is falling on the tasks present in the Bucket list.


Expected Result:

After invoking Enter key the keyboard focus should fall on more options button which is inside the “To do” edit box and after that if we press tab key Focus should fall on ‘Add Task' button.


User Impact:
Keyboard users will not get to know the presence of the ‘More options’ button.

MAS Reference: MAS 2.4.3 - Focus Order
Tags: A11yFeature; A11yMAS; A11yMediumImpact; Accessibility; edge; keyboard; MAS2.4.3; Project; Project Board and Task Details; Project Online; Sev3; Web; Wipro
Comments: @Tharun Kopparapu Thank you.
@Joanna Parkhurst ☀ as the focus is falling on most relevant element on a page. You can resolve the bug as By Design.

@Tharun Kopparapu - We received feedback from PWD testing that we should be landing users on the first most relevant element on a page/in an area, not always the first. For instance, when you open a word document you land in the content area rather than the first option on the page ("File" button). 

Have you heard guidance otherwise? I can confirm with Anupama if so.
@Joanna Parkhurst ☀ The current behavior is what was in the spec, seems that this is by design? The more option button is accessible from the task card using up arrow key or shift+tab.

Title: [Keyboard - File Upload- Cancel Button] : Tooltip of ‘Cancel’ and ‘Yes’ button is not accessible using Keyboard Navigation.
Description:
User Experience:
Users who rely on keyboard will face difficulty if Tooltip of ‘Cancel’ and ‘Yes’ button is not accessible using Keyboard Navigation.
Test Environment:
OS build Version 1903 (OS Build 18922.1000)
Edge version: Microsoft Edge 44.18922.1000.0 ​
URL: https://forms.office.com/
Repro Steps:
1. Open the URL and login with valid 'V-' credentials and activate the narrator using 'Ctrl+ Win+ Enter' key.
2. Navigate to 'New form' button using tab key and activate using Enter key.
3. Navigate to 'Add new' button using tab key and activate using Enter key.
4. Navigate to 'More Question Type' drop down using tab key and activate using Enter key.
5. Navigate to 'File Upload' button using tab key and activate using Enter key.
6. Navigate to Yes and Cancel button using tab key and observe whether the tooltip gets displayed or not.

Actual Result:
Tooltip of ‘Cancel’ and ‘Yes’ button is not accessible using Keyboard Navigation.

Expected Result:
Tooltip of ‘Cancel’ and ‘Yes’ button should be accessible using Keyboard Navigation as it has the descriptive information about the buttons.

NOTE:
This issue can also be observed for the Response Tab.

MAS Reference:
https://microsoft.sharepoint.com/teams/msenable/_layouts/15/WopiFrame.aspx?sourcedoc={1823da5a-e8fb-4e63-b881-7eccb312c358}

Title: [iOS] Request for a 5 day view in Calendar (117111517163458)
Description:
Customer is requesting a DCR for a 5 day view in the Calendar in Outlook for iOS.

Business Impact Statement:

Turner Industries use Outlook calendar for all of their mobile calendar scheduling of corporate contacts. Their executives are on the road often and rely upon the app to maintain productivity. The reason for the 5 day view is so they can get a full listing of their week without having to scroll from screen to screen to schedule. The expectation is that if the app says this is a “week” view, is should be just that. Not, 3 days. So, the extra steps scrolling through the app are an impact to productivity while in the field.

Couple of uservoice with a few votes:
https://outlook.uservoice.com/forums/293349-outlook-for-ios/suggestions/8658739-calendar-week-view
https://outlook.uservoice.com/forums/293349-outlook-for-ios/suggestions/15622890-calendar-week-view

Title: Create handy tool or script for bb local rerun
Comments:
Changelist: 19056011

OfficeVSO:3305617 - Create handy tool or script for bb local rerun

Explain Fix: The process of running a bb investigate and bb local is like walking through a minefield.

bb local lets you do things you should probably never do, like:

- Create a mixed sync state on your bb machine, where the test bits come from different places/versions than the product bits.

- Try to run incompatible scenarios on your bb machine.

It also forces you to pass all of the investigate arguments to bb local, in a different syntax.

'debugbbtest' has a reasonable, hard contract. You have to pass explicit params, in an explicit order.

Now you don't have to remember: "Is it '-n -fc -c ', or '-n -c ' to pass a checkpoint?"

It's just the 5th argument. You have to pass an argument there!

Every programmer in the world knows how functions work; let's make our tools mimic what everyone understands.

This is all in Perl, so we've got the long-term option of porting this directly into bb.

That can happen later, once we've tightened up the reliability, ease-of-use, etc.

The 'investigate' wrapper isn't too interesting, other than making it easier to construct the bb command.

The 'rerun' command is more interesting, making it trivial to kick off bb local jobs.

It works by reading info from previous calls to 'debugbbtest' from a log file.

The log file is in the machine TEMP folder, so it's machine-wide.

Hence, you can only rerun jobs kicked off by debugbbtest, on the same machine.

'rerun' with no extra args will:

- Fail due to ambiguity, and tell the user to be more specific.

or

- Find that there's only one possible thing they wanted to rerun, and do that.

'rerun ' and 'rerun ' will rerun the specific job they wanted.

'rerun last' will choose the most recent investigate job they made, and rerun that.

Another option would be do rerun the most recent rerun OR investigate job they made. I'm not sure which is more intuitive.

Feedback appreciated!

Everything appears to work fine on my machine, so here we go.

ITER 2 ==========

Remap to tenantxl/coauth

ITER 3 ==========

Minor fixes found in testing.

Title: [SDX Service Delivery][MAC] Prevent default task from running for ondemand scenario
Comments:
When SDXHelperApDelegate.mm gets instantiated and starts running it will schedule the default task to run and then every 4hrs after that.

Currently the app delegate gets started with a login item. implement a way to schedule the first run ONLY if its login item. NOT when its instantiated using client lib


RELEVANT CODE:

  _eventTrigger = [[SDXEventTrigger alloc] init:^(){
  	[self ensureHelperShellWithKeeplive:NO withReply:^(id<SDXHelperShellProtocol> helperShell)
  	{
    // schedule the job for CheckAndUpdateAllSdxSolution
    // OfficeVSO:3471118 - Add way to prevent default task from being scheduled
    [helperShell scheduleTask:2 withSerializedData:nil withClientId:@"SdxLoginItem" withCallbackId:0];
  	}];

Title: Encrypted section - rollout to FF
Improve MT-SANFS-001 front ends
Description:
There have been some issues with middle tier lately, and I want to apply the same NLB stability fixes to middle tier that we applied to pi-sanfs-001 last year.

This includes the following:

Enable Receive Side Scaling on the NLB NIC

Remove IPV6 from the cluster entirely.  (the sans don't use it so there's no point.)

Explain Defect: Resubmit the test fixes backed out because of mac break

Revalidated the changes against Win and Mac platforms. It will undergo more validations in our loops before the next RI.

We see unreliability in our automation runs because of the Mock10 library. The tests fail a bunch of times in the lab intermittently because the Mock10 mocks fail to resolve.

This change fixes three of such failures and introduces the virtual interfaces in Utils class which can be expanded further to completely remove the Mock10 functions in future.

Validated that all tests pass locally on multiple executions.

Title: [Calendar] Event`s end time changes during changing start time
Description:
Volodymyr Zaverukha from Testlio:

*Environment:*
Device and OS: IPad 4, iOS 10
Testable App version: Outlookstage_v2.15.0_23669
Fresh install/Update (write one): Fresh install
Connection type: Wi-Fi
Reproducibility rate: 5/5
Related Release Notes point/Test Case:

*Steps to reproduce:*
1. Launch Outlookstage_v2.15.0_23669.
2. Calendar -> Create event -> Choose time.
3. Move start time point and pay attention to event`s end time.

*Expected result:*
Event`s end time is not changed during changing start time.

*Actual result:*
Event`s end time changes during changing start time.



Original Ticket Number: AC-20958

Original Ticket Type: Bug

Reporter: Testlio

Original Components:
iOS - Calendar
Comments:
Jira Comment History:

Testlio on 2017-02-26 16:35:20 (+0000):

Dmytro Voievoda from Testlio:

Can't reproduced
Device and OS: Apple iPad mini 4 iOS 10.2.1
Testable App version:2.15.0 544.23669
Fresh install/Update (write one):Update
Connection type:Wi-Fi
Reproducibility rate:5/5



Testlio on 2017-02-26 16:35:31 (+0000):

Zuzana Čechivska limited availability from Testlio:

Reproducible. The user is adjusting only the upper line but seems that the bottom line is being moved as well and the event end time is then updated as well.
In the issue reproduction.mp4 it's changed from 6PM to 5:45PM

Device and OS: Apple iPhone 5S / iOS 10.0.1, iPhone 6+ / iOS 9.3.5
Testable App version:2.15.0 544.23669
Fresh install/Update (write one): Fresh install
Connection type:Wi-Fi
Reproducibility rate:3/3



Sarang Vyas on 2017-02-27 08:49:39 (+0000):

This is expected behavior.
If you check any calendar, the end time is usually 30 mins ahead of start time, hence changing the start time also changes end time.

cc Testlio



Testlio on 2017-03-03 22:05:16 (+0000):

Zuzana Čechivska limited availability from Testlio:

*Works as Designed*

Title: [WDAG] File/Feedback returns a black screen with dialog box "You'll need a new app to open this windows-feedback link"
Description:
From Office App within container, going to File/Feedback returns a black screen with dialog box "You'll need a new app to open this windows-feedback link"

  1. Follow self host instructions here: https://aka.ms/officewdagselfhost
  2. Open a document in WDAG
  3. navigate to backstage
  4. Click "Feedback"

Expected
OCV feedback flow

Observed
black screen with dialog box "You'll need a new app to open this windows-feedback link"
Comments:
Determined that syncing this key addresses this issue

HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Office\ClickToRun\Configuration\AudienceId

Assigning to you to sync this.

I did additional test. If the audience is production, the channel is devmain, this is invalid combination. If the audience is dogfood and channel is devmain, it is valid combination.

For a production audience, and a channel CC, it is a valid combination. However, you sometimes have to reboot application  multiple times in order to make the setting actually changes.
Reassigned to Sriram per discussed with Mark Hansen

After the investigation, the root cause is due to audience setting is messed up within the container.  
Out side the container, the Word application is configured correctly as dofood (see the attached OutsideContainer screenshot). However, when Word is opened within the Container, the setting appears to be in Production as evidenced in missing Experiment tab in the Options (see the attached InsideContainer)

If the environment setting is right, the feedback at this entry point should open a feedback Diaglog. Since current setting within the container is invalid one, the feedback logic fall back to open Windows Feedbackhub, which is blocked by the container.
Mark Hansen has updated the owiki on  visualization technology setting.

When run wdag-selfhost\EnableWDAG.ps1, my windows OS did not actually turn into WDAG mode. After the investigation, the visualization is not enabled in BIOS. After fixing this issue, I can repro now.

The owiki should contain this information: The visualization technology should be enabled in BIOS

Followed the instruction https://www.owiki.ms/wiki/Selfhost_instructions
Tested on release_ens_dev4_1900923-1700 and run wdag-selfhost\InstallOfficePR.ps1 to install latest office build.
see attached screenshot
@Zhaolong Zhang i think this is yours.
Skip, can you please route to the right contact and area path?

Title: [Android]Unable to see any role changes in the parent group by an indirect member
Description:
While checking the mentioned testcase I encountered the following bug.
TEST CASE 2337249

Steps:

1. Create a child group from Client A as admin adding Client B to it.
2. Create a parent group with child group and some other users(include Client C) added to it as members from Client A as admin.
3. Client B can access the parent group as an indirect member.   parent -> child
3. Now update the role of some other member(i.e make the user(Client C) an admin) in the parent group from Client A.
4. Now open the group info of parent group from Client B.

Actual Result:
Client B cannot see the updated role of Client C user in the group info page of the parent. 

Expected Result:
The updated role of the Client C as admin should be visible in group info page of the parent in Client Beven though he is an indirect member. (Though he doesn't receive any non-im message concerning the role updation in parent group)

Edit:
The role of Client C got updated in Client B after a very long time.

Title: The Mapping Pane should respect sandbox not avalilabe when "Continue working" comes up
MacPPT: Ctrl+Shift+Up/Down does not move paragraph selection

In Word, Ctrl+Shift+Up/Down moves the current paragraph up/down by one paragraph.

OCV linked: https://ocv.azurewebsites.net/#/item/fdcl_v4_12e28ef1c919544ca0efe446fb80d195/

Title: [MSOUTLOOK-449] Does not automatically receive mopera U mail (push)
Description:
[Carrier]CEDS_D2 JP NTT DOCOMO

condition
1. UIM (U Standard Plan Contract UIM) that can transmit moperaU mail is inserted into the tester.
2. MoperaU mail account and password are acquired from the setup site.
3. On the setup site, set the automatic mail reception setting to ON.
4. In the Outlook application, set the account by specifying the POP3 server or the IMAP server.
5. Set the mail synchronization schedule to [manual] in Outlook application.
In order to receive the mail push, not the synchronous reception of the mail,
6. Set the [Notification] setting of Outlook application to On to set any notification tone.

order
1. E-mail is transmitted to the moperaU mail account of the tester from the corresponding machine.
2. It is confirmed that moperaU mail is automatically received from mail push.

Problem Details
In order 2, moperaU mail is not automatically received by mail push (check that it is not received after 30 minutes)
Even if POP3, IMAP4 is set to either server, moperaU mail is not automatically received by mail push.

After the phenomenon occurs, start the Outlook app and check if the manual update is performed, the mail transmitted from the corresponding device can be received in order 1.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

From contracted. (Business operator TC verification company)
Please check the attached video and log.
-------------------------
Regarding today's request by email, N301OMU0ASGK conducted the test and confirmed the following results.
POP3: After sending mail from the counter, the mail was not received even after waiting for more than 10 minutes. (Same as CEDS point)
IMAP: Mail received about 4 minutes after sending mail from the competitor.
However, in the case of IMAP, there was no menu to manually set mail synchronization in the settings in the mail app, so it was performed as a default state. (See IMAP _ Setting.png and POP3 _ Setting.png in the compressed file)
If there is a way to set synchronization in IMAP, please share it.
In addition, in the case of the test, there was no content about the mail synchronization setting in the test table, so the synchronization setting was not separately performed at the time of the test, and the default state (synchronization every 15 minutes) was performed.
I attach the corresponding result log and video, so please check it.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

MSOUTLOOK-449 - Priority A
https://www.samsungmobilecoworking.com/its/browse/MSOUTLOOK-449
Comments: Samsung has marked this one as closed. They are asking for more details from the reporter on the POP issue, they may be mixing account types up with IMAP. For IMAP, they labeled the reported behavior as "expected".
Ok for IMAP I'm getting the pushes pretty much immediately - for POP we could offer a shorter window. I'm asking for more details.

@Mark Wyszomierski I attempted to download the attachments but they do not seem to open.

POP definitely does not support push. I’m not sure if there’s a delay for IMAP on the middle tier in terms of when the mail is sent and when the push is received.

WHAT THIS BUG IS:
OSubmit has automatically filed this bug as to track submitting a milestone code change into another branch. This bug has already been submitted to team triage along with that milestone bug. Once the submission to this branch has happened, resolve and assign the bug to the original Opened By for the bug so they can verify it in that branch.

WHY IT WAS OPENED:
This Dependent Link bug associated with this bug was submitted to a milestone branch. Milestone submissions are NOT automatically integrated to other branches. Instead, new bugs are opened to track individual submission to each branch.

Title: 51588738 Xcode 11: impossible to visually identify which project is which when multiple projects are open
Description:
1) Open multiple Xcode projects named "Foo", "Bar", and "Blah" (note, the names don't really matter)
2) at a quick glance, try to switch to project "Bar" without using the Window menu to select the project

BUG: it is nearly impossible, because the *only* visual indicator of the project name is in tiny text in the upper-left corner of the File Navigator. If that region is obscured by another project, or if the File Navigator is closed, then there is absolutely no visual indicator of the name of the project.

Classic MacOS Human Interface Guidelines dictated that windows have a title bar with the name of the document/folder/project/object be prominently displayed in the middle. Xcode violates that design and has ever since Xcode 6 (see Radar 17799959, which was incorrectly duped to a bug about not having an icon in the title bar for drag and drop). This bug is not about being able to access the project file reference, it is simply about being able to easily identify the name of the file in a given project window.

See attached screenshot.

Title: Develop Airflow DAGs for validations
Ring:1 App:Word Mode:View - Product Validation Pass: Manual Test Pass Status
Description:
This is the bug that we should open every time we start a new Product Validation Pass in a Ring.
Important things to remember:
  1. Use THIS template to log the Product Validation Pass status
  2. Update the title to say which Ring was the test pass done on (Ring 1 or 2 etc) , App (Word, Excel, OneNote or PowerPoint) and Mode (View, Edit)
  3. Fill the Opened Build with the right build# 
  4. Always ensure that the status of the Product Validation Pass is updated (As shown below)
The different status are:
To show that the pass has started please change the following values:
State : Active and Sub-Status : In Progress

To show that the pass is completed and found NO ship blocking bugs
State: Closed and Reason (filled by default) : Fixed

To show that the pass has completed and found SOME ship blocking bugs
State: Resolved and Sub Status : Blocked

Title: Product Validation:[OneNote Only]The second list item of to do tag list not increase indent after an existing list.
Description:
ENVIRONMENT/RING: Ring1: OneDrive & SPO

REPROS IN PROD (YES/NO): YES  16.0.11414.33700

TEST CASE ID: #CAList10    Lists  (Web view)

SESSION ID: 4ff30dcb-5da7-45dc-89c7-5c57e25f2e95[c]

STEPS: 

  1. Open a OneNote notebook

  2. Create a list in the notebook.

  3. Press two times enter.

  4. Click on To Do Tag button on Ribbon to generate a tag list.

  5. Continue to generate 2 more list item by pressing enter and "List Item 1/2/3" .

  6. Put IP in front of the second item.

  7. Click on number list button on Ribbon.

ACTUAL RESULT:
The second list item decrease indent.

EXPECTED RESULT:
 A list number is added to the second item and the second list item increase indent.

OTHER INFO:
Affected Apps: OneNote Only

Affected Browsers: Edge, Chrome, IE11, Firefox

Changelist: 18750783

OfficeVSO:2495438 - Press enter twice in bulleted list goes one indent up in Word but not on OneNote

OfficeVSO:3174568 - Product Validation:[OneNote Only]The second list item of to do tag list not increase indent after an existing list.

Explain Defect: Pressing enter once in a list creates a new bullet/number as expected. If enter is pressed a second time without adding content the bullet/number is removed as expected but the indentation is not decreased. In other words, the list isn't exited when enter is pressed twice. This has several implications:

1. Any list created after, without manually pressing backspace prior, will be treated as part of the list that was exited. Therefore, numbering will continue in this new list even though visually, the space between, the lists are not related.

2. Adding a list to a To Do tag decreases the indentation of the line because the bullet/number will match the margin of the previously exited list.

Explain Fix: - Promote the empty outline element that is created when a user presses enter twice.

- Prevent the creation of a new outline element after the empty list outline element

Notes: Changes were validated in BlueChicken.

A setting has also been added, OneNoteWordStyleListExitIsEnabled. ExternalRingsIsOffByDefault

Title: [MAU UX Refresh] Define expected MAU API for UX Refresh in Engineering Plan
Audit Log for Tasks
Description:
Scenario(s) / Justification
Enabling task related activities in the audit log will help organization admins maintain security of their task data and monitor it for unauthorized access. 

Additionally, having tasks in Audit Log may fulfill a customer promise we have to our customers of Teams.



What is the work
  • Determine the activities we want to log in Audit Log
    • What fields do we made to Audit Log common schema (for search)
    • What fields do we add to extended schema (for display with search results for tasks)
  • Implementing writing to Audit Log endpoint for each relevant task activity 
    • Set up authorization to write to Audit Log's NRT endpoint (we will write any relevant activity that need to appear in the logs to this endpoint)
  • Figure out if Task Fabric already participates in Audit Log 
    • If might make more sense for Task Fabric to do the writing to Audit Log vs Planner - we can't estimate until we figure which teams should call audit log APIs

VSO-3313396 : [OCS] - Excel Share from Outspace : Use new API IsFromOutspace and IsForSharing

We were using the API IsForDocumentNotDisplayedToUser() to determine if an AppDocs operation is from outpace or not.
The behaviour of this API changed and as a result of this, Excel is facing a crash in the March prod. This has also resulted in a change in behaviour for Share from Inspace also which is incorrect.
DocsUI has now provided 2 new Apis (CL-18923746), IsFromOutspace/IsForSharing which should be used by the Apps in place of the older API. We will now use IAppDocsUserContext::IsFromOutspace() to determine if the operation is from outpace and IAppDocsUserContext::IsForSharing() to determine if the operation is due to sharing.

Validation:
For files in Host mode, validated share from inspace ( Send A Copy=>Send With Another App)
For files in Host mode, validated share from outspace
For files in Ocs mode, validated share from inspace

Jira Comment History:

Former user on 2013-07-16 07:11:29 (+0000):

Start/stop script is checked in. The CI auto deploy can be modeled after a script I'm using to do local deploy on my laptop:

#!/bin/bash

GIT_ROOT=~/git/acompli/server
TARBALL=$GIT_ROOT/backend/build/acompli-backend-*.tar.gz
CTL=$ACOMPLI_HOME/bin/acmbectl

if [ ! -e $TARBALL ]; then
    echo "missing install tarball, aborting" >&2
    exit 1
fi

if [ ! -e $ACOMPLI_HOME ]; then
    mkdir -p $ACOMPLI_HOME
fi
if [ -e $CTL ]; then
    $CTL stop force
    rc=$?
    if [ $rc != 0 ]; then
        echo "can't stop server, aborting" >&2
        exit $rc
    fi
fi

cd $ACOMPLI_HOME
if [ -e conf/server.properties ]; then
    cp conf/server.properties server.properties.backup
fi
rm -rf bin conf lib
tar xfz $TARBALL

$CTL start
echo -n
echo -n
echo "Local deploy successful!"

Djordje Gluhovic on 2013-07-17 00:21:37 (+0000):

We can run python unit tests as a suite, from bamboo if that's your preference. Not sure how you do it for java, periodic poll might make sense since a python test suite on a large project will take a while to run. It wouldn't make sense to run this as a git pre push hook since it's much too slow.

There are tools for python syntax and style checking, for example pylint/pychecker. This runs fairly fast, so this can be scripted as a git pre (or post) push hook, so it could even deny a push.

There are also tools for python unit test coverage (e.g. figleaf), but this is used for generating reports. Bamboo integration would be nice here, to view these. Please let me know if this is worth looking into, I don't know if supported.



Kevin Henrikson on 2013-07-17 01:20:09 (+0000):

Bamboo will watch the frontend repos for changes. The post commit hook will fire and tell Bamboo to start a build.

Bamboo can run most scripts that can be run from the command line. Ideally I'd like to have something to verify syntax and fail/flag on anything typos. Assuming there are some unit tests in the code then I'd like to have those run in a 2nd stage and report on pass/fail and also ideally some kinda of coverage report in % wise.

In the java project we have 3 phases.

1 - Compile

  • Basic incremental compile very fast

2 - Test/Validate phase

  • Clean/full build
  • unit tests (faster)
  • integration tests with external servers (slower)
  • package installer/build

3) Deploy

  • copy package to AWS
  • auto-upgrade dev server (start/stop/untar new code etc)

I'd like to get something similar for python based on what makes sense.

Title: Allow sending an attachment without having to download and re-upload it
Description:
If the user gets an attachment part of email A, then they want to send the same attachment as part of a new email. Currently the client has to download the attachment, then upload it and use the assigned uploadId as the sending attachmentId.

JJ's comment in HipChat:
we may implement this as a general feature, using some kind of global URI. in the global URI we'll include account ID as well, and possibly account type.
that way you can just specify a URI to any file reference such as in another email account or in Dropbox
once we implement Dropbox and multi-email account implementation this becomes useful.

Doug Kent on 2013-09-24 17:52:54 (+0000):

For FrontEnd server, please use Small EC2 instance type and attach an EBS volume 100 GB in size. The EBS volume will be used for logging, which can get pretty huge, as FE logs both the response from backend AND the message sent to the client. By using a Small EC2 instance, which is 1 EC unit, we can hopefully measure and estimate the "concurrent users per EC unit", allowing us to determine scalability needs as we grow.



Mike Deeks on 2013-09-24 18:08:59 (+0000):

Good idea. I'll be setting these up today. That amount of logging will be scary as we grow. Invaluable right now as we're building things of course. But later on we'll probably want to limit logging of outgoing requests. Or at least start rotating away logs at a faster rate. I've seen outages happen multiple times due to disk fulls, so heavy logging scares me now. I'll keep that in my notes as something to track in the future.



Doug Kent on 2013-09-24 18:13:56 (+0000):

Agreed. Right now, all logging is in the most verbose form. Going forward, we'll trim it down for sure. Let me know if you have any questions on the FE setup.

Mike Deeks on 2013-09-26 22:51:25 (+0000):

It's working but Bamboo is not very good at this. It doesn't understand that a single artifact (backend for example) can be deployed to multiple servers/environments. Also I have to duplicate all of the tasks for each environment we create. Some of the tasks are buggy. I think ultimately I'll switch us to a different tool like Jenkins. I have used it extensively and it has all sorts of plugins for Atlassian stuff like Hipchat.



Kevin Henrikson on 2013-09-26 23:13:17 (+0000):

Ugg 😀 we've got support so if you see issues or have problems we should file bugs/tickets. So far they've been pretty good at least responding or trying find work arounds etc. I really don't want to get another tool to host/run for this since we'll need to do all the work to integrate things and lose all the audit/tracking we now have as it's tighter in Atlassian world right now.

Feels like if all the deploy is scripted or puppet controlled then the code/steps in bamboo should be nothing more than a trigger to kick off the process and pick up the build.



Mike Deeks on 2013-09-30 21:42:15 (+0000):

After thinking about it a bit I think I agree. Lets stick with Bamboo for now. Its slow, buggy in some places, and a pain in the butt to setup, but once it is working its fine. The tight integration with Jira and Bitbucket are nice.

Title: Need user's display name to pre-populate HelpShift setup
Description:
To setup Helpshift we need the user's Name and Email. We are pre-populating email today but need the Display name to make the first support use seemless.



Original Ticket Number: AC-318

Original Ticket Type: Story

Reporter: Kevin Henrikson

Original Components:
Backend
Comments:
Jira Comment History:

JJ Zhuang on 2013-09-20 05:11:37 (+0000):

BE work done. Reassign to Doug.



Doug Kent on 2013-09-20 05:13:39 (+0000):

Reassign to Ogden 😀



JJ Zhuang on 2013-09-20 05:17:52 (+0000):

Doug don't you need to hook up the thrift call to getDisplayName before Ogden can do it?



Doug Kent on 2013-09-20 05:21:37 (+0000):

I have no idea how Helpshift works. Ogden will let me know what he needs.



Ogden Kent on 2013-09-20 05:24:14 (+0000):

Doug and I chatted. He now understands the requirements.



JJ Zhuang on 2013-09-20 05:25:25 (+0000):

Well, HelpShift is just one use case. The main thing about this ticket is to retrieve displayName from server so that client can use it for all kinds of things, including composing.



Ogden Kent on 2013-09-20 05:28:33 (+0000):

JJ - When I queue up an outgoing message, I'm not setting a from-field. Is that something we need to do?



JJ Zhuang on 2013-09-20 05:28:55 (+0000):

Cool.



JJ Zhuang on 2013-09-20 05:33:46 (+0000):

So it's OK for now, as the server will fill that in if missing. At some point we might need to deal with multiple aliases for the same account and at that time we'll need to know which alias the user wants to use. But that's not any time soon. So I spoke too soon about composing.

Display name is potentially useful for all kinds of other things, like even just for UI title in some cases. Helpshift is the first concrete example, but I'm sure you'll have use of display name for other cases so make sense to store it locally once retrieved.



Doug Kent on 2013-09-20 05:39:35 (+0000):

How often does this DisplayName change? If it never changes and can be cached on iOS client indefinitely, then it can be passed down on initial authentication. However, if it will change, then it should be a separate call (which is how it's now implemented). Latter is cleaner and desirable, if found to be adequate.



JJ Zhuang on 2013-09-20 05:47:15 (+0000):

It is a separate call. Feel free to call it right away after successful auth.

In theory it can change, but very rarely, as display name typically is just user's "First Last". So yes it can change, with marriage or court order.

Most clients treat them as invariants.

We already have TMessage.replyToAddrs field in BE thrift API. It's an optional list of reply-to addresses. (Note plural)



Kevin Henrikson on 2013-11-05 08:18:05 (+0000):

This is asking about if I get a mail with a reply-to different than the FROM. Who should handle the reply (to over-ride to with reply-to not from)



Former user on 2013-11-05 16:15:10 (+0000):

It's the responsibility of the app. The TMessage object that is returned by the BE on get call contains both From and Reply-To. The app should display the From header and from address, and use Reply-To list to initialize the reply composer.

Title: VPN access
Description:
Reduce our exposure by requiring VPN access to all internal systems, services, and tools.

OpenVPN is the likely choice as it offers the highest security, performance, and simplicity. Though it lacks the ubiquity of IPsec. IPsec support is built into all OSes including iOS and Android. OpenVPN requires a client install everywhere.

Fallback to the configuration mess of IPsec as a last resort.

Title: pull-to-refresh (or similar way to let users force an update)
Description:
Users are asking for better/more status on app state. When I switch to mobile I want to see my inbox as it looked on my desktop (or other app) a few moments ago. Best if we can have detailed info from the BE/FE on where we are in sync process (ie waiting on your email server ie it's gmail/exchange's fault you are waiting)

Ogden Kent on 2014-01-03 19:02:58 (+0000):

Kevin Henrikson Beth Miles I like the idea of pull-to-review...

"When users open Jawbone’s Up app, for example, it automatically syncs and updates with the company’s companion activity tracking wristband, UP24. So now, when users pull-to-refresh, Jawbone instead displays a bite-size, digestible summary of what data was just transferred when the program synced. Call it pull-to-review."

http://www.fastcodesign.com/3023421/why-the-pull-to-refresh-gesture-must-die



Kevin Henrikson on 2014-01-03 19:45:14 (+0000):

Good with me, as long as we can the show the user real and exact status of sync with mailbox/backend and not the frontend.

The key thing that frustrates me with our app is we don't show a real status. We say "up-to-date" but what we mean is we are up-to-date with the FE and not the mailbox. The user expects up-to-date with mailbox. Especially as first time users still have their old app be it mail.app, mailbox, or what they just saw on their desktop client they know what they expect to see. Today we only force a sync on app open. Today I find myself closing our app and then re-opening to trigger the force sync. Even then I need to just wait to see if it updates as there is no in-app status that the FE has asked for a force sync and it's in progres. I want to see when a force sync is in progress so ideally we can show that in the same area with the pull to review data.

Title: BE to use ISO log format
Description:
We should stick to the ISO standard format like use for all of our other logs. We should also force PDT/PST timezone so it's easy to compare device, FE, BE, etc logs. This is important for Helpshift and Sentry so we can get a good holistic view of all logs.

[df setDateFormat:@“yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ssZ”];

Which gives a timestamp that looks like this:
2014-03-15T13:10:01-0700
